channel.title: Bug - Chill Button Peaced out in a clutch!
channel.description:
Played game as Reaper. Got Mystic linked. That night, King's logs rolled from prior reap and I saw Mystic's #. Day began with king dead; vote time froze actions for a few. On resumption:
What happened: Used Chill ability. Chilled target whispered King right after. Looked at my Chill ability. **Yep, I'd used it. 8 was selected.** Chilled 8 a second time. Worked, but in the meantime Mystic outed me to King.
What should've happened: Chill should have functioned :stuck_out_tongue:
Steps to reproduce: Rush to Chill on a Dead King morning
Comments: immediately was exed because it didn't fire off of course ;_; nbd on a fluke instance but if it happens to many that would suck.
** sorry, no SS. I was confused and rushing to re-chill the fella 8 was the mystic XD

item.title: Bug - Chill Button Peaced out in a clutch!
item.dc:creator: Xavier_Bourret
item.description:
Happen to me too . It was me , reaper , sherrif (that was chilled) i upped the reaper on stand and after i voted him he chilled me and got out of stand because of that.(And won)

Read full topic
item.source: Bug - Chill Button Peaced out in a clutch!

item.title: Bug - Chill Button Peaced out in a clutch!
item.dc:creator: w1ngz
item.description:
Sry if that was confusing. Yea I had reaped the starting King and as the day started he died and his logs rolled, so there was a period of time to “Vote for new King” and in fact for the sake of all info available – only one person stepped forward with RB for King, so there was not an actual vote iirc, just a “pause” on the day clock while that took place.

My plan was to Chill the Mystic and Reap him that night (empowered if the day went poorly), to prohibit use of Telepathy or whispers. Mystic still would’ve outed me with Telepathy, I imagine.

Read full topic
item.source: Bug - Chill Button Peaced out in a clutch!
